Yandex Disk.name: F03c.01
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose whether it enables third parties to target its users with advertising content?

Yandex Disk.name: F03c.02
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose what types of targeting parameters are not permitted?

Yandex Disk.name: F03c.03
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose that it does not permit advertisers to target specific individuals?

Yandex Disk.name: F03c.04
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose that algorithmically generated advertising audience categories are evaluated by human reviewers before they can be used?

Yandex Disk.name: F03c.05
Yandex Disk.description: Does the company clearly disclose information about the processes and technologies it uses to identify advertising content or accounts that violate the company’s rules?
